snippet: A federal court ruling denies access to information involving the killing of an American citizen. The public has the right to know.
abstract: Editorial criticizes federal Judge Colleen McMahon's ruling on Obama administration's use of targeted killings, in which she refused to require Justice Dept to disclose memorandum providing legal justification for killing of terrorist leader and American citizen Anwar al-Awlaki; urges Pres Obama to order legal memo released along with other information that would shed light on legal reasoning and evidence leading to Awlaki's killing.
lead_paragraph: A federal court ruling denies access to information involving the killing of an American citizen. The public has the right to know.
